section.p: For configuring the triggers for an organization, you need the following information to be provided by the organization that wants to use an external process control system:

ul.li: Which action is to be subject to process control?
For which organization is trigger processing to be configured (organization ID)?
How can the notification service of the external process control system be reached? You need the URL of the notification service WSDL file, for example: https://myServer:8280/NotificationService?wsdl

Is the action to be suspended until it is approved? If not, it will be executed in and the external system will be informed about the execution. If the action is to be suspended, will wait for a reply from the external system before the action is executed.

section.p: In the user interface, choose Manage triggers from the Operation menu. For detailed step-by-step instructions, refer to the online help.
